g.text: • proves to the verifier that a certain amount of a specific computational effort has been expended
• fetches the shared digital resources from the server
• generates a puzzle and challenges the prover to solve it
• verifies the solution to the puzzle and accepts or aborts the transfer of digital resources
, the identifier of the resource as well as
a set of identifiers of the recipients
2. Verify that the relevant resource with its recipients exists
3. Return the HTTP response with the permission ticket
4. The verifier is waiting for a reasonable time
5. The prover affords a computation to solve the puzzle
and resources, using the permission ticket
8. Return the HTTP response with the solved puzzle (

and accept or abort the transfer of digital resources
